original_body_lines: The National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka, announces an exclusive one-day workshop titled, “Understand Your Market Competition & Consumer: Market Research Insights and Analytics for Business Competitiveness” on October 7 from 9.00 a.m. to 4.00 p.m. at the National Chamber Auditorium.

This workshop will empower participants with vital market research skills, helping them understand customer behavior, identify new market opportunities, and optimize marketing strategies. Through practical applications and real-world insights, participants will learn to design, measure, and interpret marketing performance to drive ROI and improve business competitiveness.

Resource Team Lead: Waruna Kathriarachchi, a market research expert and former Director at Nielsen Sri Lanka, will lead the session, sharing insights from his 25+ years of research and analytics experience across multiple industries including FMCG, Telecom, and Finance.

This workshop is tailored for: Entrepreneurs looking to expand their market insights; Marketing, Brand Management, and Business Development Executives; Kay Account Managers and Brand Managers; Marketing Managers and Strategists and the Programme includes: Introduction to Market Research Process; Key Aspects of Market Research: Customer Experience, Product & Distribution Research, and New Business Opportunities; Market Research Design and Sampling Methods; Practical Sessions on Questionnaire Design and Data Analysis; Emerging Methods and Ethical Considerations in Market Research.

Registration details: Contact Hansi / Nishanthi/ Tharushi at 077 3678728, 076 2555707, 011 4 741 788 or email hansi@nationalchamber.lk; nishanthi@nationalchamber.lk.  Registrations will be accepted till 5.00pm, 6th of November 2024.
